mapper.insert: insert into relation (s_user_id, r_user_id, type) values (#{userId}, #{friendId}, #{relation})
mapper.update: update relation set s_user_id = #{userId}, r_user_id = #{friendId}, type = #{relation}
mapper.select: select r.s_user_id, r.r_user_id, m.name, f.save_file, r.type from relation r join member m on r.r_user_id = m.user_id left join file_info f on m.profile_no = f.file_no where r.s_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from relation where s_user_id = #{userId} and r_user_id = #{friendId}
